home.transparentNutrition: Transparent nutrition, balanced flavors. We believe in food that makes you feel amazing inside and out.
home.curatedNutritionDesc: Explore our specialized menu categories, each designed to provide specific health benefits while delighting your palate.
home.pureIngredientsDesc: We use 100% farm-fresh, organic ingredients. No stabilizers, no hidden sugarsâ€”just pure, honest food that your body deserves.
home.macroPrecisionDesc: Every calorie is counted. Every gram of protein is verified. Know exactly what you are fueling your body with for optimal health.
home.sustainableLifeDesc: Sourced locally, packaged sustainably. We care for your health and the environment, creating a better future for everyone.
home.readyToEatDesc: Step into a space where every bite is calculated for your health and every flavor is crafted for your soul.

footer.craftingFuture: Crafting the future of transparent nutrition. Every meal is a step towards a better, more balanced you.

about.heroDefault: The Healthy Corner was born from a vision to redefine what 'healthy eating' truly means in Mauritania.
about.storyDefault: Founded from a simple belief: healthy food doesn't have to be boring. We combine nutritional science with culinary expertise to create meals that fuel your body and delight your taste buds.
about.integrity: Integrity is our main ingredient. We believe that everyone deserves to know exactly what they are consuming, which is why we've pioneered the most transparent food service in the region.
about.missionDefault: Our mission is to make healthy eating accessible, enjoyable, and transparent.
about.commitmentToExcellence: Commitment to excellence in every aspect of our process, from sourcing to final serving.
about.milestonesDesc: Recognition for our commitment to excellence in health and nutrition over the years.

services.servicesDesc: At The Healthy Corner, we go beyond serving food. We provide a complete health and nutrition ecosystem tailored to your lifestyle.
services.startJourneyDesc: Our nutrition experts are ready to craft a personalized lifestyle plan just for you. Reach out today and feel the difference.

contact.getInTouchDesc: We're here to fuel your journey. Reach out for orders, inquiries, or just to say hello.
contact.whatsAppDesc: Instantly place your order or ask a question.

search.searchPlaceholder: Search for food, ingredients, or macros...
search.tryDifferentKeywords: Try checking your spelling or use different keywords.

favorites.exploreMenuDesc: Explore our menu and tap the heart icon to save your favorite healthy meals.
